title: Railworks TS2014 TaD ProLine British Highspeed I
description:
rains and Drivers ProLine scenariopack features daily highspeed traffic between Glasgow and London on the West Coast Mainline North* and the West Coast Mainline Overshap* routes in Train Simulator. Experience the Class 390 Pendolino* and the Class 221/222 Voyager* trains while driving prototypical Virgin TrainsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ sercives with a highly detailed and accurrate AI traffic. Eight scenarios ( four on each route) with a moderate difficulty level await you. As this scenariopack is focused on prototypical traffic based upon the timetable of 2013/2014, a higher amount of DLCs and additional freeware repaints are needed to enhance your driving experience.

TaD 1. 1M07 0630 Glasgow Central to London Euston
First part of the scenario: drive from Glasgow to Carlisle, stopping at Motherwell and Lockerbie on the way.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 2. 1M07 0630 Glasgow Central to London Euston
Second part of this southbound scenario going from Carlisle to Preston with stops at Pentrith, Oxenholme Lake District and Lancaster.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 3. 1M16 1540 Glasgow Central to London Euston
First part of a southbound scenario, from Glasgow to Carlisle.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanSchwer
TaD 4. 1M16 1540 Glasgow Central to London Euston
Second part of the scenario, from Carlisle to Preston.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 5. 1S42 0730 London Euston to Glasgow Central
First part of a northbound scenario from Preston to Carlisle. Intermediate stops: Lancaster and Penrith.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 6. 1S42 0730 London Euston to Glasgow Central
Second part of the scenario from Carlisle to Glasgow Central.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 7. 9S77 1343 London Euston to Glasgow Central
First part of the northbound scenario. Drive the leg from Preston to Carlisle on a snowy afternoon.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
TaD 8. 9S77 1343 London Euston to Glasgow Central
Second part of the scenario, from Carlisle to Glasgow Central.
70 MinutenPassagiertimetabled / FahrplanMedium
